text.section: At least 1 year before the commencement of the review and evaluation of its regulations, each unit shall prepare a work plan and submit the work plan to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of this article, the Committee.

The work plan shall:
include a description of the procedures and methods to be used by the unit, which may include:
procedures for inviting public comment, including:
procedures for ensuring the participation of stakeholders in the review process;
procedures for ensuring the participation in the review process of other units affected by the regulations; and
procedures for gathering and reviewing:
identify the individual or individuals in the unit who will coordinate the evaluation and communicate with the Committee; and
establish the schedule the unit will follow to complete its evaluation report in a timely manner.

section.section:
Within 30 days after receipt of the work plan by the Committee, it shall:
advise the unit in writing of any part of the work plan with which it disagrees;
submit to the unit in writing any changes it recommends to the work plan; and
in the event of a disagreement, attempt to meet with the head of the unit.
The head of the unit and the Committee shall attempt to resolve any disagreements within 30 days after the Committee acts under this subsection.
